required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Development of a Marker of Adherence for Tracking Consumption of Nutrient Supplements
clinical_study.official_title: Development of a Biomarker to Assess Adherence to Nutrients Supplements

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine whether selected adherence markers can be used to track daily or intermittent consumption of nutrient supplements.

detailed_description.textblock: The investigators will assess whether urinary concentrations of selected adherence markers can be used to distinguish between daily or intermittent consumption of lipid-based nutrient supplements.

primary_outcome.time_frame: change in concentration between study day 4 (baseline) and study days 7,8,12,13 and 15
change in concentration between study day 4 (baseline) and study days 7,8,12,13 and 15
change in concentration between study day 4 (baseline) and study days 7,8,12,13 and 15
primary_outcome.description: resveratrol metabolites may include resveratrol glucuronides and/or resveratrol sulfates

primary_outcome.measure: urinary concentration of resveratrol metabolites (nmol/g creatnine)
primary_outcome.time_frame: change in concentration between study day 4 (baseline) and study days 7,8,12,13 and 15
primary_outcome.description: resveratrol metabolites may include resveratrol glucuronides and/or resveratrol sulfates

arm_group.description: Daily supplementation with product containing markers
Daily supplementation with either the product containing markers or the product not containing markers
Daily supplementation with product not containing markers

intervention.intervention_name: lipid-based nutrient supplement containing adherence markers
intervention.description: The supplement will be provided once daily for 10 days

intervention.intervention_name: lipid-based nutrient supplement containing or not containing adherence markers
intervention.description: The product containing adherence markers will be provided once daily every other day (5 days total); the product not containing adherence markers will be provided on the intervening days for a total of 10 days.

intervention.intervention_name: lipid-based nutrient supplement not containing adherence markers
intervention.description: The supplement will be provided once daily for 10 days

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- non-pregnant, non-lactating women
Exclusion Criteria:
- BMI <18.5kg/m2 or >25.0 kg/m2
- Diagnosis of chronic disease
- Use of medication that can affect gastrointestinal mobility
- Consumption of more than 7 alcoholic drinks per week
- Smoking
- Unwillingness to refrain from consuming dietary sources of the marker compound(s) 3 days prior to, and during the 12 day urine collection period
- Unwillingness to adhere to the study protocol
- Peanut allergy
- Cow milk allergy
- Soy allergy
- Almond allergy
- Allergy to adherence markers
- Pregnancy
